meta.job_title: Senior Full Stack Java Software Engineer

duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead all aspects of solution design and development of both client-side and server-side web applications.
Develop an engaging and visually appealing front end for dentists around the United States to purchase goods for their businesses using a multitude of different devices.
Develop RESTful APIs used by sellers to ship orders and maintain product catalogs.
Develop a high-speed Java backend using Spring Boot.
Assist in modeling data for relational databases and writing fast and efficient queries.
Ensure the performance, scalability, and security of the web application.
Accomplished change management leader who is able to operate effectively in a fast-paced and ever-changing environment.
Provide technical guidance and oversight for the full software development life cycle, including requirements gathering, design, development, testing, and deployment.
Participate and/or lead Agile Scrum and/or Kanban methodologies and meetings to ensure project goals are met.
Work with stakeholders to ensure technology solutions efficiently meet business requirements and objectives.
Set realistic timelines with effective communication to technical/business stakeholders.
Mentoring and coaching junior full-stack engineers to improve their technical skills and help them grow professionally.
Participating in code reviews to ensure the quality of the codebase.
Identifying and resolving technical issues and making architectural decisions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (Master's preferred)
